short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat with any website: Ask questions, find information and get summaries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension, a sophisticated tool distills the essence of any website, making it visually appealing, and easy to comprehend.

It not only provides succinct summaries of your elected websites but also places the power of curiosity at your fingertips, allowing you to ask questions and obtain instant, detailed answers related to the site's content.
